column1: #text=Today my sweat tooth is acting up .
#text=I think a good cake is in order for myself and my family to enjoy as dessert after supper .
#text=I scan my cabinets for the ingredients and realize that a trip to the store is in order to get what I require .
#text=After a fast trip to the local store i have everything I need for a delicious pineapple upside down cake .
#text=Butter , mix , fresh pineapple , cherries , yum , yum !
#text=Now time to get the oven preheated and mix the stuff up and get it ready to bake .
#text=Twenty minutes later a delicious cake goes into the oven and another 45 minutes later a wonderful smelling masterpiece comes out of it .
#text=Ten minutes to cool slightly and then flip it over onto a board to finish cooling .
#text=I sneak a taste from one corner and find it is as delicious as it looks and smells .
